title: Our Favorite Tech and Moments of 2021!
description:
It's the holiday season so the team got together to recap what a crazy year 2021 has been for tech (and for us). Marques and Andrew sit down with each member of the MKBHD team to ask each of them what a few of their favorite moments, projects, and tech of the year were.
